event.caption: May 03 2009 11:51:19 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: @davidzoltan @crankyuser It was code for the Journey to the End of the Night game, counting players and progress. Check out survivedc.com

event.caption: May 03 2009 02:28:25 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: Is sleepy and glad everyobe had a good time. G'night, and G'game!

event.caption: May 03 2009 00:00:13 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: CP3 shutting down. Final count: 241 players through.

event.caption: May 02 2009 23:14:53 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: CP3 200

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:52:26 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: Cp3 150

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:28:53 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: CP3 100

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:09:32 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: CP3 still only has 65 through it.

event.caption: May 02 2009 21:56:45 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: CP3 just hit 50

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:52:17 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: CP3 okay three marines just actually made it through.

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:47:53 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: So they're waiting here for the rest of their team bfore they can get stamped. And hoping their team doesn't all get caught.

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:45:21 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: Seems they're sharing one passport, and each group is running one leg and handing it off.

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:41:06 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: First group is part of a relay team. Not sure how legal that is but they're waiting for their relay group.

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:35:30 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: CP3 first person. Group of threee actually.

event.caption: May 02 2009 19:06:51 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: checkpoint 3 is ready to greet the Beav and all his little friends.

event.caption: May 02 2009 18:26:37 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: Checkpoint 3 is prepped, waiting for Leah and stamp/bonus box gear.

event.caption: Apr 18 2009 13:07:44 EDT
event.title: fizzbang: Tonight, I'm test-walking the route for this year's Journey to the End of Night DC. Game goes live on May 2nd! http://www.survivedc.com/

event.caption: May 03 2009 03:32:09 EDT
event.title: elbuenob: Fantastic turnout for Journey, over 600 of you made the city your play area!

event.caption: May 02 2009 23:07:36 EDT
event.title: elbuenob: @raulzahir It's journey. We're sending em thru en masse. We control your city tonight.

event.caption: Apr 28 2009 20:43:20 EDT
event.title: elbuenob: The night draws near and the second chaser is waiting. Meet The Oncoming Storm. http://www.survivedc.com/navigate

event.caption: Apr 17 2009 13:33:45 EDT
event.title: elbuenob: 2 weeks until Journey to the End of the Night. Get your teams together or run solo and register now! http://www.survivedc.com/

event.caption: May 03 2009 02:46:18 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: 85 survivors. Finish is heading home. Thanks, all, for a /fantastic/ night!

event.caption: May 03 2009 01:22:26 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: 63 survivors so far. :)

event.caption: May 03 2009 00:19:43 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: 17 to finish.

event.caption: May 02 2009 23:35:47 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: 11 survivors to the finish so far.

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:38:18 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: Yep--camping across the street to the North.

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:37:46 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: Tons of chasers hanging out outside checkpoint 6. Might ned some Good Player Fairy support.

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:35:05 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: Just got 2nd survivor group, 1st chaser plaer. Other chasers out to catch more.

event.caption: May 02 2009 22:11:38 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: Suggest chasers go to light chasing--player chaser volume seems to be sufficient to slow people. :) Nice work, all!

event.caption: May 02 2009 21:38:40 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: Marine 3 at the finish!

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:42:33 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: Don't sign unless they filled out all previous checkpoints--checkpoints must be done in order (except for bonus)

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:10:43 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: Bunches went to metro.

event.caption: May 02 2009 20:07:37 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: Released!

event.caption: May 02 2009 19:59:20 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: @annapurna: In fact, you should ask them to call back later and talk to a player. :)

event.caption: May 02 2009 19:44:10 EDT
event.title: secretjourney: 600+ people. Should not leave yet--tag any who left early. Will release at 8.
